alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ALACHUA...NORTH CENTRAL MARION AND WEST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rochelle, or 10 miles northwest of Citra, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose, Hawthorne, Melrose Landing, Cross Creek, Orange Heights, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Johnson, and Lochloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam
